thread.title: Mrs. Coleen Marshall
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs. Coleen Marshall

author: Mrs. Coleen Marshall
title: Mrs. Coleen Marshall
text: I was very pleased with the way Katie helped with colours etc and she made an excellent job in measuring as it was a difficult suite to have loose covers, but the result looks lovely and worth the expense as the material is washable and no ironing required. I had a sofa covered in loose covers some years ago and with all the wear it has had, it still looks like new and I have washed the covers in my washing machine several times without any shrinkage or fading. Would recommend.
